Hierarch Kekropus:
It's about who controls the Superion.
Great energy is required in order to make that giant thing move.
A long time ago, when the Giants' empire was strong, the magical powers of the Giants were so powerful that we couldn't dare imagine. Back then, it was no surprise that anyone could control the Superion. But now, the appearance of someone who can control the Superion should be very worrying, shouldn't it?
